item.title: Earle-Sears targets Spanberger's record on trans issues in Virginia governor's race

item.title: Iowa's Sen. Ernst is serious: She's not running
item.description: Sen. Joni Ernst made it official Tuesday: She's not seeking reelection.

item.title: Trump moves Space Command to Alabama, reversing Biden decision
item.description: President Trump announced Tuesday that U.S. Space Command will move from Colorado to Alabama, a decision that was "seven years in the making."
